transcript: you can't be insecure about something unless there's someone else making this judgment otherwise there would be nothing to be insecure about naming who owns that insecurity takes it from this really amorphous thing to like it's John really wow it is John when I was selling one of the businesses I started playing these voices just one particular entrepreneur that I know and I was like he's gonna think that this isn't enough money I had to write down his name and say like will I let this person stop me from exiting this company when I saw it it just seemed so small and I was like no this guy is going to influence my decisions going to change the rest of my life because of a voice I have in my head that he doesn't even know I'm thinking about him
